name: QueryResults
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Dataset
QueryResults
description:
QueryResults is a special case Array with additional values. A QueryResults object is returned from Dataset#run and contains the Entities from the query as well as the query’s cursor and more_results value.

Please be cautious when treating the QueryResults as an Array. Many common Array methods will return a new Array instance.

examples.caption: Caution, many Array methods will return a new Array instance:
examples.code:
entities = dataset.run query
entities.size #=> 3
entities.end_cursor #=> "c3VwZXJhd2Vzb21lIQ"
names = entities.map { |e| e.name }
names.size #=> 3
names.cursor #=> NoMethodError

methods.name: more_results
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Dataset
QueryResults#more_results
methods.description:
The state of the query after the current batch.

Expected values are:

“MORE_RESULTS_AFTER_LIMIT”: “NOT_FINISHED”: “NO_MORE_RESULTS”:

methods.name: not_finished?
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Dataset
QueryResults#not_finished?
methods.description: Convenience method for determining id the more_results value is “NOT_FINISHED”

methods.name: more_after_limit?
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Dataset
QueryResults#more_after_limit?
methods.description: Convenience method for determining id the more_results value is “MORE_RESULTS_AFTER_LIMIT”

methods.name: no_more?
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Dataset
QueryResults#no_more?
methods.description: Convenience method for determining id the more_results value is “NO_MORE_RESULTS”
